review: Very good and easy to use.

review: with this purchase every TV in our house now has one attached to it, with all the sites and the apps you can use to chromcast we no longer have the need for cable
author: Robin Collins

review: First one I got failed after a few months but Google's warranty system worked fast, easy and at no cost. Works fine for getting Youtube to your TV.
author: Stephen Berens

review: It works as intended. Not very exciting
author: Fred Dorfman "Jazz lover"

review: Returned item because I do not wish to use my phone as a remote. I want a simple remote that allows me to choose to answer my phone or not. This requires more I. Q. than my 74 year old brain cares to share...
author: Bobby G Dempsey

review: AMAZON INSTANT VIDEO WILL NOT PLAY ON THIS AT THIS TIME.
author: Doug Thornburg

review: Works great, very nice to have. I may buy another for the bedroom.
